video.title: Coach
video.synopsis: As a college football coach, Hayden Fox tries to balance his professional goals and hunger for gridiron glory with his personal relationships.

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is still struggling with his daughter being old enough to date. So when she mentions she dated a faculty member, he's pushed over the edge.
episodes.title: Kelly and the Professor

episodes.synopsis: Luther gets a reality check and entrusts Hayden with a "death box" to someday execute his will. The box, however, gets opened prematurely.
episodes.title: Love Me Tender

episodes.synopsis: Christine insists that Hayden tell his daughter, Kelly, the truth about their relationship when she and Christine start becoming good friends.
episodes.title: Kelly, Meet Christine

episodes.synopsis: Kelly brings her new boyfriend, Stuart, home for dinner. But as the meal progresses, Stuart, a mime, starts to wear on Hayden's patience.
episodes.title: I'm In Love with a Boy Named Stuart

episodes.synopsis: Minnesota State's on a losing streak, and Hayden is grouchy. But Christine isn't prepared for his mood to have such a big impact on their home life.
episodes.title: The Loss Weekend

episodes.synopsis: When Luther wins a steak dinner by betting against the Screaming Eagles, Hayden blows his top and suspends him for a month.
episodes.title: Gambling for Meat

episodes.synopsis: Every year, Hayden holds a quiet father-daughter celebration for Kelly's birthday. But this year Kelly has invited her mime boyfriend, Stuart.
episodes.title: 19 Candles

episodes.synopsis: Parents' Weekend is fast approaching, and Hayden's ex-wife, Beth, will be attending. Christine is curious to get a look at her.
episodes.title: Parents' Weekend

episodes.synopsis: A benefactor has died, and Hayden fears the loss of his donations will hurt the team. Hayden consoles the man's widow to keep the money flowing.
episodes.title: I'm Sorry I Told You My Wife Was Dead

episodes.synopsis: Hayden's patience, fidelity and temper are put to the test when Christine goes out on a date with another man.
episodes.title: Define Romance

episodes.synopsis: The team needs one more victory to pull off a winning season. Yet their success depends upon their star player, who's let his triumphs go to his head.
episodes.title: Whose Team Is It, Anyway?

episodes.synopsis: Kelly's dance instructor, Madame Roola, is developing a ballet inspired by football. Hayden soon finds himself the object of Madame Roola's desire.
episodes.title: Hoot, Hoot Hike

episodes.synopsis: The season is over, and Dauber is planning an over-the-top bash to celebrate. A reluctant Hayden is asked to supervise the event.
episodes.title: Dauber's Blow-Out

episodes.synopsis: While Christine, a woman of culture, tries to understand the appeal of football, Hayden's staunch aversion to art brings out her inner linebacker.
episodes.title: I Don't Know Much About Art, But I Know What Makes Me Mad

episodes.synopsis: Hayden's plan to get even with the women's basketball coach jeopardizes Dauber's romance with her.
episodes.title: Dauber's Got a Girl

episodes.synopsis: Hayden accepts a dinner invitation from Kelly and her fiancé, Stuart. When the soon-to-be-wedded couple start bickering, Hayden enjoys the show.
episodes.title: Bring Me the Head of Stuart Rosebrock

episodes.synopsis: In a last-ditch attempt to thwart Kelly's marriage to Stuart, Hayden does the mature, fatherly thing and runs away.
episodes.title: If a Coach Falls in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: As the football season's pressure mounts, Hayden develops a hard-to-conceal facial tic before a nationwide television broadcast.
episodes.title: If Keith Jackson Calls, I'll Be at My Therapist's

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to play the matchmaker, Christine decides to set the serially single Luther up on a blind date with one of her friends.
episodes.title: I'm In the Mood for Luther

episodes.synopsis: Soon after settling into a long-awaited romantic getaway, Hayden and Christine are beset upon by Kelly and Stuart.
episodes.title: A Man and a Woman (and Two Theater Majors)

episodes.synopsis: Luther takes a risk and invests in the Touchdown Club with Hayden's encouragement. But their friendship is put to the test when there's a break-in.
episodes.title: The Investment

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine's relationship runs afoul of their professions when Christine boasts to a sportscaster that Hayden secretly recruited a player.
episodes.title: I've Got a Secret

episodes.synopsis: In anticipation of a major professional achievement, the ever-modest Hayden Fox makes party arrangements to celebrate an award he has not yet won.
episodes.title: The Curley O'Brien Award

episodes.synopsis: Hayden spends the weekend with Kelly and all her in-laws.
episodes.title: The Rosebrocks of Wisconsin

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is the top dog in his own backyard, but when he attends a coach's conference with the pros, his bark is barely heard.
episodes.title: Coaches Conference

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden agrees to man a booth at the college carnival, the women's basketball coach seizes the opportunity for some long-awaited payback.
episodes.title: Carnival Knowledge

episodes.synopsis: Minnesota State University's new president bears a striking resemblance to a woman Hayden was once involved with.
episodes.title: Haven't I Slept with You Somewhere Before?

episodes.synopsis: When Christine is called away on business, Hayden stays at her place over the weekend. Problems arise when Luther comes over to keep him company.
episodes.title: Homewreckers

episodes.synopsis: When the college requires him to teach at least one class, Hayden registers the team and to teach what he thinks is the easiest course: history.
episodes.title: Professor Doolittle

episodes.synopsis: When Luther takes a much-needed vacation, Hayden looks after his prized pet bird. Being Hayden, however, he promptly loses his charge.
episodes.title: Sunshine on My Shoulder Makes Me Happy: A Show About Bird Ransom

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is beyond delighted when Kelly agrees to fill in at the office for his secretary, Mrs. Thorkelson, who's away on vacation.
episodes.title: Kelly Girl

episodes.synopsis: After Hayden steadfastly refuses to attend the opera with Christine, she makes a decision to take her ex-boyfriend instead.
episodes.title: A Jerk at the Opera

episodes.synopsis: In an ironic twist of fate, Hayden rescues a little poodle that just so happens to belong to Judy's parents, who then proclaim Coach Fox a hero.
episodes.title: Poodle Springs

episodes.synopsis: Hayden rejoices when his team breaks into the top tier of a national football ranking. But the good news is undermined when a star player is injured.
episodes.title: That Shouldn't Happen

episodes.synopsis: When a painful, rotting tooth forces Hayden out of commission during a big game, Luther must step in to coach the team.
episodes.title: Magnificent Abscession

episodes.synopsis: When the university president begins trying to attract a big-name basketball coach with a sweet compensation deal, Hayden finds his own star waning.
episodes.title: The Day That Moses Came to Town

episodes.synopsis: Hayden begrudgingly agrees to let his chief rival, Coach Watkins, take a chair at the boys' regular poker game, even though he can't stand her.
episodes.title: Is This Your First Time on the Riverboat, Miss Watkins?

episodes.synopsis: When Christine falls ill, Hayden is torn between doing what he should do (staying home with her) and what he wants to do (celebrating with the team).
episodes.title: Hayden's in the Kitchen with Dinah

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden and Luther get stranded out of town, Hayden's absence leaves Christine with no one to escort her to an awards banquet.
episodes.title: Hayden and Luther's Excellent Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Hayden faces the difficult choice of joining his buddies for a night of football or joining Christine to meet with an antiques-dealer friend.
episodes.title: The Break-Up

episodes.synopsis: Nothing seems to be able to lift Hayden out of his depression over his recent breakup with Christine, not even the attention of a beautiful woman.
episodes.title: The Iceman Goeth

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a big fight, Christine makes plans to move all of her belongings out of Hayden's house once and for all.
episodes.title: Cabin Fever

episodes.synopsis: Hayden begins to realize that he can't deal effectively with his breakup with Christine all by himself, so he seeks out help from a support group.
episodes.title: Men Don't Heal

episodes.synopsis: When the annual charity ball rolls around, Hayden doesn't have anyone to bring, prompting him to reminisce about meeting Christine the first time.
episodes.title: When Hayden Met Christine

episodes.synopsis: Hayden's in for a surprise when his ex-wife shows up at his Christmas party. But the real shock comes when she announces her holiday gift for Hayden.
episodes.title: Christmas Brains

episodes.synopsis: Dauber finally graduates and Hayden hires him to coach -- but Dauber wants a change.
episodes.title: Dauber Graduates

episodes.synopsis: Hayden discovers that a $10 million grant might be given to Minnesota State's basketball program instead of his beloved football team.
episodes.title: Puppy Love

episodes.synopsis: When Luther is confronted with the reappearance of a former friend who stole the love of his life, Christine convinces Luther to meet with him.
episodes.title: The Marion Kind: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: One of Luther's former best friends, who had stolen his girlfriend nearly 40 years ago, takes his girlfriend for the second time.
episodes.title: The Marion Kind: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When an awkward social outcast decides to try out for the football team, Christine takes him under her wing and instructs him on how to be popular.
episodes.title: Leonard Kraleman: All-American

episodes.synopsis: Stuart might mean well, but he drives Hayden crazy with his constant complaining when the family tries to get away for a relaxing ski vacation.
episodes.title: 2 BRs, MTN, VW

episodes.synopsis: When Minnesota State's athletic director finds himself in Las Vegas for the first time, he wants to explore everything Sin City has to offer.
episodes.title: Hurley-Burleigh

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is virtually caught with his pants down when he becomes spokesman for a jock strap manufacturer.
episodes.title: Hayden Fox for Universal Jocks

episodes.synopsis: Hayden reveals his softer side when he helps Luther with the challenge of a lifetime -- getting him back together with his estranged father.
episodes.title: A Father and Son Reunion

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden finds himself wondering how he'll afford an engagement ring for Christine, he discovers the perfect solution: to buy one at a discount.
episodes.title: Diamonds Are a Dentist's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: When his team reaches the top 20 in an important national ranking, Hayden's picture appears on the cover of Sports Illustrated.
episodes.title: The Kick-Off and the Kiss-Off

episodes.synopsis: A distraught Kelly wants to share her burden with Christine but has to settle for crying on Hayden's shoulder instead.
episodes.title: Since My Beaver Left Me

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden encourages Kelly to date one of his players, she finds herself deeply attracted to him. But she soon learns about his sexual preference.
episodes.title: A Real Guy's Guy

episodes.synopsis: When Christine asks Hayden to go house shopping, he resists but then gives in. He later surprises Christine by buying a house without consulting her.
episodes.title: Any Place I Hang Myself Is Home

episodes.synopsis: A befuddled Hayden is surprised to discover that a man who was little more than an acquaintance of his has bequeathed him a most unusual gift.
episodes.title: Requiem for a Groundskeeper

episodes.synopsis: When Luther trades in his and Hayden's airline tickets during a trip, they must share a tiny, cramped train compartment for the journey.
episodes.title: I Think I Can't, I Think I Can't

episodes.synopsis: Hayden reveals his true feelings for Christine's friend Barbara. But before long, he begins to regret his decision to be so forthcoming.
episodes.title: I Hate Barbara

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden's boss, Howard, invites him to speak at a meeting of his beloved Fraternal Order of the Loon, Hayden gets more than he bargained for.
episodes.title: Loonstruck

episodes.synopsis: Hayden falls into a funk when he learns that the opposing coach in a big game is his former mentor. Can he overcome his feelings for his old friend?
episodes.title: The Pineapple Bowl: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When one of his best players is injured in a strange limousine accident just before the big game, Hayden puts an end to the frenzied pre-game hype.
episodes.title: The Pineapple Bowl: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden discovers that his rival, Coach Watkins, is positioning herself to receive a big donation, he tries to woo the money for himself.
episodes.title: Rizzendough Revisited

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden's ex-wife's boyfriend asks Hayden about their relationship, Hayden tells him more about his former wife than the man needs to know.
episodes.title: Return of the Marriage Killer

episodes.synopsis: When a thoughtless word passes between Dauber and Luther soon after Dauber moves into Luther's apartment building, the two end up in a food fight.
episodes.title: War of the Dopes

episodes.synopsis: At a surprise party for Grandpa Rosebrock's 90th birthday, the lovesick Kelly gets her own surprise when Stuart arrives with his new girlfriend.
episodes.title: The Woodchuck, the Beaver and the Fox: A Menage a Trois

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden and Christine witness a wealthy, arrogant man insulting his girlfriend, they decide to intervene on her behalf.
episodes.title: No Good Deed Goes Unpunished

episodes.synopsis: Luther finds himself sharing a night of passionate romance with Hayden's 60-year-old secretary. But the next day he's too embarrassed to face her.
episodes.title: Last of the Red-Hot Luthers

episodes.synopsis: Unbeknownst to Hayden, Christine sells off his prized football shoes that were signed by football hero Johnny Unitas.
episodes.title: The Old Fish and the Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Kelly falls in love with a hotshot news correspondent who is based abroad in Bangkok, Thailand. Meanwhile, Luther believes he's shrinking.
episodes.title: Dateline-Bangkok

episodes.synopsis: Though she had decided to remain in Minnesota to be with Hayden, Christine's resolve is shaken when she's offered a lucrative network job in New York.
episodes.title: If That's Opportunity, Don't Answer

episodes.synopsis: Christine secretly resolves to move to Minnesota to be with Hayden, not knowing that, meanwhile, Hayden has decided to move to New York.
episodes.title: Frequent Flyers, Crossed Wires

episodes.synopsis: Just as the tolls of a long-distance relationship become too much, Christine hits a snag with her job that could have her moving back to Minnesota.
episodes.title: Can We Go Home Now?

episodes.synopsis: Buoyed by the excitement of the team's first win of the year, Hayden uses his new television show as a means to propose to Christine on the air.
episodes.title: To Air Is Human

episodes.synopsis: Dauber volunteers with the Big Brothers program. But his girlfriend Judy isn't thrilled about competing with an 8-year-old for Dauber's affection.
episodes.title: Big Brother, Little Brain

episodes.synopsis: When Kelly refuses to attend the "Father of the Year" banquet with her dad, headstrong Hayden hires Kelly's roommate to pose as his daughter.
episodes.title: Father of the Year

episodes.synopsis: Tired of playing second fiddle to Hayden's head-coach status, Luther petitions for more recognition on his contributions to the team.
episodes.title: Born Luther

episodes.synopsis: The office gets an injection of unbridled enthusiasm when the athletic director's wife, Shirley Burleigh, accepts a job as her husband's assistant.
episodes.title: Shirley Burleigh, Girlie Friday

episodes.synopsis: With an eye on raising money for the Minnesota State athletic department, Hayden attends a dog show to meet wealthy widow Mrs. Rizzendough.
episodes.title: Rizzendough Rendezvous

episodes.synopsis: Luther entrusts Hayden with a box containing his most personal effects, never dreaming that Hayden and Christine will examine its contents.
episodes.title: Love Me Tender

episodes.synopsis: Ever-faithful friend Luther is crestfallen -- and a little annoyed -- after learning he won't be the host of Hayden's bachelor party.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: Bride-to-be Christine's visions of nuptial perfection are shattered when Luther accidentally sets her wedding gown on fire.
episodes.title: Dresswreckers

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine check off an important item on their wedding to-do list when they decide to exchange vows inside Christine's childhood home.
episodes.title: Vows

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and his team are thrilled to be competing in the Patriot Bowl -- that is, until it proves to be one of the worst games they've ever played.
episodes.title: The Patriot Bowl

episodes.synopsis: It's a Christmas of confusion when Dauber and Hayden's gifts for their girlfriends end up in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: My True Love Gave to Me...

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine are cast as love interests when they're asked to star in a coffee commercial. But Hayden doesn't quite measure up.
episodes.title: The Commercial: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After being benched for his inadequate acting skills, Hayden has to watch Christine play the love interest opposite another man in the commercial.
episodes.title: The Commercial: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kelly receives a large check from her ex-husband, a professional mime. But Hayden's mood sours when she informs him of her plans for the money.
episodes.title: Buzzy Money

episodes.synopsis: After searching high and low for the perfect place to get married, Hayden and Christine make an impulsive decision.
episodes.title: Vegas Odds

episodes.synopsis: When Howard and his wife decide to claim Hayden and Christine as their new best friends, the coach and his fiancée find themselves in an awkward spot.
episodes.title: Burden of the Burleighs

episodes.synopsis: A former player pays Hayden a visit to tell him that an injury is forcing him into early retirement. But the real reason is far more serious.
episodes.title: The Bigger They Are

episodes.synopsis: Luther's relationship with his girlfriend, Lorraine, is finally heating up. But he's having serious doubts about their long-term compatibility.
episodes.title: Luthario

episodes.synopsis: Hayden can't resist playing a practical joke on Judy during an athletic ceremony. But his childish prank provokes an unexpected consequence.
episodes.title: Dirty Tricks

episodes.synopsis: Christine wonders aloud whether she needs a face-lift to compete in the job market, prompting Hayden to work overtime to convince her she doesn't.
episodes.title: About Face

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is so determined to recruit one of the country's most sought-after prospects, that he'll do anything -- and that's no understatement.
episodes.title: Why So Happy, Hayden?

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine finally tie the knot after several failed trips to the altar.
episodes.title: One for the Road

episodes.synopsis: Christine's surprise announcement that she's ready to become a mother has Hayden preoccupied with the pitfalls of fatherhood.
episodes.title: Baby on Board?

episodes.synopsis: When Luther gets dragged into court for his dog's bad behavior, Hayden defends the animal for biting the school's bandleader.
episodes.title: Belly of the Beast

episodes.synopsis: Christine is experiencing unprecedented success in her career. But Hayden's over-inflated ego has him refusing to admit that she came by it honestly.
episodes.title: Nice Job If You Can Get It

episodes.synopsis: When Hayden and Luther butt heads over whether the team has been successful because of hard work or sheer luck, their friendship takes a serious hit.
episodes.title: The Luck Stops Here

episodes.synopsis: Kelly announces her plan to take a job in New York City. But Hayden, ever the protective father, doesn't want his little girl moving to the Big Apple.
episodes.title: If She Can Make It There...

episodes.synopsis: Hayden encourages Dauber to buy a motorcycle over Judy's objections.
episodes.title: Uneasy Riders

episodes.synopsis: In a bid to beat his loneliness, Luther forges a tentative friendship with a young boy who doesn't have a father.
episodes.title: Piece o' Cake

episodes.synopsis: After trying to conceive for several months, Christine delicately suggests that it might be time for her and Hayden to visit a fertility clinic.
episodes.title: Running on Empty

episodes.synopsis: Kelly is almost unrecognizable when she returns home to Minnesota after taking on a flashy job at a New York advertising agency.
episodes.title: It Came from New York

episodes.synopsis: On the day before the Screaming Eagles's most important game of the year, Hayden realizes he's lost his playbook.
episodes.title: The Playbook

episodes.synopsis: When Luther lands in the hospital on the same day the Screaming Eagles are slated to play for the national championship, Hayden has to carry on alone.
episodes.title: The Pioneer Bowl

episodes.synopsis: After investigating his family tree, Luther discovers a large contingent of Van Dams living nearby and decides to look them up for the holidays.
episodes.title: Christmas of the Van Damned

episodes.synopsis: When Christine agrees to look after a friend's infant for the weekend, a frantic Hayden enlists Luther and Dauber's help.
episodes.title: The Babywreckers

episodes.synopsis: It seems like a dream come true when Luther is offered a job as head coach at a nearby college. But after so many years assisting Hayden, is he ready?
episodes.title: Coach for a Day: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After leaving Minnesota State for a dream job as Aberdeen College's head coach, Luther isn't exactly enjoying his new post.
episodes.title: Coach for a Day: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hayden begins wearing a device to increase his sperm count. He later agrees to appear on Christine's show, only to discover he's sprung a leak.
episodes.title: My Cup Runneth Over

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is disillusioned when he realizes Kelly's job takes priority over his awards night.
episodes.title: Like Father, Like Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Hayden ends up in marriage counseling when Howard Burleigh discovers his wife is having an affair.
episodes.title: The Devil in Mrs. Burleigh

episodes.synopsis: Hayden will say anything to attract one of the most sought-after high school stars in the nation. But he doesn't really want to play football.
episodes.title: Blue Chip Blues

episodes.synopsis: After many visits to the fertility clinic -- and zero-percent success at getting Christine pregnant -- Hayden decides to recruit celebrity sperm.
episodes.title: The Stand-In

episodes.synopsis: When an old flame saunters back into the picture, Dauber is so distracted by his feelings for her that he jeopardizes his relationship with Judy.
episodes.title: Something Old, Something New

episodes.synopsis: Christine's attempt to bond with Hayden and his friends on a fishing trip turns into an assault on their egos when she reels in the biggest catch.
episodes.title: One of the Guys

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine are subjected to a night of unexpected surprises when they agree to go on a double date with Luther and Ruthanne.
episodes.title: My Best Friend's Girl

episodes.synopsis: As part of a full-fledged battle of the sexes, the men's coaches take on the women's coaches in a decidedly unfriendly game of golf.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Mr. Putts

episodes.synopsis: Hayden celebrates his 49th birthday by driving a race car at 150 miles per hour.
episodes.title: Head Like a Wheel

episodes.synopsis: In the first part of a two-hour special, Mary Hart of television's "Entertainment Tonight" interviews Hayden about his fondest memories as head coach.
episodes.title: Coach: The One-Hour Special: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the conclusion of a two-hour special, Hayden continues his long look back on his Minnesota State coaching career with interviewer Mary Hart.
episodes.title: Coach: The One-Hour Special: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hayden hears a rumor that a professional organization is considering interviewing him for a position. But he lets his excitement get the best him.
episodes.title: Pros & Cons

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to keep up with the biggest names in his field, Hayden hires image consultant Susan Miller to help turn him into a national superstar.
episodes.title: It Should Happen to You

episodes.synopsis: The demands of Hayden's new image consultant, the single-minded Susan Miller, begin having a negative effect on the way he does his job.
episodes.title: Graceless Under Fire

episodes.synopsis: Hayden does his best to lend Dauber some much-needed moral support when he discovers that Judy has given back Dauber's engagement ring.
episodes.title: Judy's Turn

episodes.synopsis: When Luther's wife begins to complain he's spending too much time at work and too little time at home, he vows to dedicate less time to Hayden.
episodes.title: Above and Beyond the Call of Hayden

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated by their failed attempts to conceive and a lack of spontaneity surrounding their love life, Hayden and Christine have a major falling out.
episodes.title: Inconceivable

episodes.synopsis: Despite repeated warnings from Hayden, Christine accepts an invitation to attend a wild bachelorette party thrown by Luther's wife.
episodes.title: Jailbirds

episodes.synopsis: Hayden finds himself in hot water when his reaction to a co-worker is deemed sexist. Feigning ignorance, he blames his actions on Christine.
episodes.title: My Fair Agent

episodes.synopsis: Hayden wades in unfamiliar territory when cuts to the university's non-football athletic budget force him to participate in a televised debate.
episodes.title: Be a Good Sport

episodes.synopsis: Christine discovers that her longtime co-anchor has mapped out a plan to not only have her fired, but also have her replaced by a much younger woman.
episodes.title: Working Girl

episodes.synopsis: Hayden feels guilty when the demands he imposes on his team to play rough result in an opposing player getting badly injured.
episodes.title: Out of Control

episodes.synopsis: Just as Hayden, Luther and Dauber are preparing the team for one of the biggest games of the season, rumors surface that Coach Fox is going pro.
episodes.title: The Popcorn Bowl

episodes.synopsis: Luther and his wife want to make changes that will improve their lives as a couple. But shedding their bad habits produces some unexpected results.
episodes.title: Luther and Ruthanne Take the Big 12 Steps

episodes.synopsis: Christine encourages a reluctant Hayden to check himself into a sleep therapy clinic to cure his insufferable snoring.
episodes.title: Did Someone Call Me Snorer?

episodes.synopsis: When their fighting and bickering become too much to bear, Hayden and Christine seek outside help and sign on for an "anonymous encounter" weekend.
episodes.title: Close Encounters of the Worst Kind

episodes.synopsis: A letter from a prospective European recruit leads Hayden on a trip to a country that's currently being held under martial law.
episodes.title: The Kicker

episodes.synopsis: Hayden's decision to give unwavering support to a new walk-on player, who many believe is too old to play, threatens to divide the squad.
episodes.title: The Walk-On

episodes.synopsis: Concerned that heartbroken Dauber will be all alone on Valentine's Day, Hayden sets him up with a blind date and organizes a couple's dinner party.
episodes.title: Call Me Cupid

episodes.synopsis: Hayden's attempt to buddy up to former Dallas Cowboys coach Jimmy Johnson are foiled when Luther's dog swallows one of Jimmy's Super Bowl rings.
episodes.title: Johnsonwreckers

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine's invitation to attend a dinner honoring football great Frank Gifford is spoiled when Luther is disappointed he wasn't invited.
episodes.title: The Day I Met Frank Gifford

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is usually thrilled when Kelly visits. But his spirits deflate when he learns her new boyfriend is old enough to be her father.
episodes.title: Kelly's New Guy: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Undaunted by her father's reaction when he learned he and her boyfriend are the same age, Kelly soon becomes involved with one of Hayden's friends.
episodes.title: Kelly's New Guy: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Luther's relationship with his long-time agent, Art Hibke, takes a turn for the worse when he makes an appearance without obtaining Art's consent.
episodes.title: Ten Percent of Nothing

episodes.synopsis: After buying a truck from Hayden that promptly breaks down, Luther accuses his friend of knowingly selling him a lemon.
episodes.title: Don't Get Mad, Get Cooley

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine go on a cruise. But Hayden's attempt to get away from football proves unsuccessful when a socialite makes him an offer.
episodes.title: Oh, a Pro Job: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hayden considers leaving Minnesota State University to coach a professional franchise, but he worries about his control over the team.
episodes.title: Oh, a Pro Job: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Before the start of the new football season, Hayden embarrasses himself and the organization by accidentally offending the city of Orlando.
episodes.title: Is It Hot in Here, or Is It Me?: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: To make up for offending the entire city of Orlando, Hayden must guide the Breakers to victory on opening day.
episodes.title: Is It Hot in Here, or Is It Me?: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After moving into a senior retirement community, Luther finds himself the center of attention with three women interested in being his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Fool for Lunch

episodes.synopsis: Interested in starting a family, Hayden and Christine look into the possibility of adoption, only to discover that their ages might be a problem.
episodes.title: She's Having Our Baby: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine try to convince a pregnant teenager who wants to give her baby up for adoption that they would make great parents.
episodes.title: She's Having Our Baby: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Breakers are the underdogs in every game. But if Hayden can recruit his star quarterback from Minnesota State, the team might be able to improve.
episodes.title: Bo Knows

episodes.synopsis: After each Breakers game, Doris's TV station broadcasts game highlights. But when Doris fires the show's annoying host, she must find a replacement.
episodes.title: Coach's Cornered

episodes.synopsis: Tipped off that a roadside attraction called Turtle World is a great investment, Luther convinces Hayden to help him buy the place.
episodes.title: Turtle World

episodes.synopsis: Luther gets a new faithful companion when his beloved dog dies.
episodes.title: There's Got to Be a Mourning After: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hayden tries to dissuade Luther from seeing Doris.
episodes.title: There's Got to Be a Mourning After: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Howard and Shirley Burleigh visit Christine and Hayden for a weekend.
episodes.title: Bye-Bye Burleigh: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Howard is fired from his job at Minnesota State and looks to Hayden for help.
episodes.title: Bye-Bye Burleigh: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hayden tries to focus on the upcoming game, but Doris has other things on her mind. She thinks re-signing a sexy player should be the team's priority.
episodes.title: The Tight End

episodes.synopsis: Hayden struggles to decide which players should be cut from the Breakers's roster. But Christine invites a player he's about to cut over for dinner.
episodes.title: Nice Guys Get Cut

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine's plans for adopting Julie's unborn baby take an unexpected hit when the father of the child comes back into the picture.
episodes.title: Her Boyfriend's Back

episodes.synopsis: Tim Conway guest stars as Hayden's incompetent gardener, who can't seem to keep any plants alive.
episodes.title: The Gardener

episodes.synopsis: Christine consults a specialist when Hayden's energy and sex drive come to a halt.
episodes.title: Patching Things Up

episodes.synopsis: Doris has an offer to move the Breakers to Los Angeles. But Hayden is determined to keep the Breakers where they are.
episodes.title: Save the Wave

episodes.synopsis: Hayden gives Dauber some advice on buying a new car, but Dauber doesn't listen. Soon Dauber realizes that he can't keep up with the high payments.
episodes.title: Dauber's Vehicle

episodes.synopsis: Nobody knows where Luther's pet monkey has been, so when it bites Hayden's finger, everyone fears the worst and the staff goes into quarantine.
episodes.title: Quarantine

episodes.synopsis: Angry about burning himself at Hayden's barbecue, Luther decides to take drastic measures by filing a multimillion-dollar lawsuit against his friend.
episodes.title: Van Dam vs. Fox

episodes.synopsis: The Breakers hold a fantasy camp, and Hayden agrees to coach a team but comes to regret his decision when dealing with the players prove to be a pain.
episodes.title: Fantasy Camp

episodes.synopsis: Doris prepares to visit a few of her wealthy friends on a hunting trip. When Luther claims that he's a great hunter, Doris decides to bring him along.
episodes.title: Luther Get Your Gun

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is under pressure when the Breakers have the first pick in the NFL draft.
episodes.title: A Player to Be Named Later

episodes.synopsis: Christine and Hayden's adoption of the baby becomes complicated when Julie's father enters the picture.
episodes.title: Somebody's Baby

episodes.synopsis: As Christine and Hayden experience the joys of parenthood, they also experience lack of sleep.
episodes.title: Sleepless in Orlando

episodes.synopsis: Hayden is excited when he's offered the chance to write a memoir. But soon he learns the subject of the book is "living with losing."
episodes.title: Just Short of the Goal

episodes.synopsis: Doris returns from her trip to Brazil with a gift for the whole team: She has found a young, sexy new player to join the Breakers.
episodes.title: Last Tango in Orlando

episodes.synopsis: Hayden desperately wants to have a romantic evening with Christine, but Christine is terrified to leave the baby with a stranger.
episodes.title: Isn't It Romantic?

episodes.synopsis: Hayden and Christine must select a guardian for Tim in the event of their death, but they get scared when the Burleighs show too much enthusiasm.
episodes.title: We Can Never Die

episodes.synopsis: Dauber enters into a storybook romance with a theme-park employee. But he has second thoughts when he suspects Hayden might not approve of the match.
episodes.title: Grimmworld

episodes.synopsis: When Luther and Doris decide to marry, Howard smells publicity and pushes the couple to stage their wedding during a Breakers half-time show.
episodes.title: In the Money

episodes.synopsis: Defying all expectations, the Breakers finally make the playoffs. But the big news also means that Hayden will have to spend Christmas in Cleveland.
episodes.title: You Win Some, You Lose Some

episodes.synopsis: Dauber reconsiders his place in the universe -- literally -- after he thinks he's had a close encounter with a group of aliens.
episodes.title: Somewhere Out There

episodes.synopsis: When the Burleighs give Tim a Princess Tiffany doll, Luther fears the toy could damage the child's upbringing.
episodes.title: A Boy and His Doll

episodes.synopsis: When the Breakers fire his former gardener, Kenny, Hayden feels so terrible that he writes a glowing recommendation for his hapless former employee.
episodes.title: The Body Gardener

episodes.synopsis: Eager to investigate a business opportunity in Colorado, Doris arranges a ski trip for Valentine's Day. The coaching staff is invited to tag along.
episodes.title: To Ski or Not To Ski

episodes.synopsis: The boys' annual fishing trip is sabotaged by Luther's bad planning and a hungry alligator.
episodes.title: It's a Swamp Thing

episodes.synopsis: The gang goes to Las Vegas, where Luther sinks his life savings into Elvis memorabilia.
episodes.title: Viva Las Ratings

episodes.synopsis: When asked how baby Tim got his name, Hayden recalls the convoluted story of how a mix-up with a hospital employee led to a baby-naming contest.
episodes.title: A Fox by Any Other Name

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the Breakers's successful season, Doris rewards the coaching staff with free sessions with her psychic.
episodes.title: The Stench of Death

episodes.synopsis: A mother boasts that her little girl, who's only a few days older than Tim, can already walk and talk. The claim sparks Hayden's competitive streak.
episodes.title: Baby Coaches

episodes.synopsis: When Doris promotes Luther, Hayden is short one defensive coordinator, a job he thinks would be perfect for the legendary linebacker Dick Butkus.
episodes.title: Upsized

episodes.synopsis: Skeptical of their sketchy new neighbors, Hayden and Christine find themselves wrapped up in a covert surveillance operation.
episodes.title: The Neighbor Hood

episodes.synopsis: With other teams eager to lure Hayden away, Doris offers her star coach $17 million to remain with the Breakers for 10 more years.
episodes.title: Leaving Orlando: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hayden reflects on the highs and lows of his coaching career with his closest friends, Luther and Dauber.
episodes.title: Leaving Orlando: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hayden, Luther and Dauber are back at Minnesota State where they see familiar faces and reminisce about their early years as college coaches.
episodes.title: Leaving Orlando: Part 3
